comments:
i20040310

Got the message that appears in the first entry in the log on an error dialog (a
general message for errors executing actions?).

The scenario was (cannot reproduce anymore):
- editing a Java source file
- change editor mode to "selected element only"
- select a method in the outline
- ensure the editor has no text selected
- press ctrl+shift+F (format) - error happened

Although I cannot reproduce it anymore, I thought you might be interested in the
stack trace.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 4 Mar 12, 2004 14:37:01.143
